name: rxdb
description: A realtime Database for JavaScript applications
author: pubkey

scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.// test:fast: run tests in the fast-mode. Most of them will run in parrallel, skips tests that are known slow
scripts.test:fast: npm run test:fast:memory && npm run test:fast:lokijs && npm run test:fast:dexie
scripts.test:fast:memory: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:fast:memory-validation: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory-validation NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:fast:lokijs: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=lokijs NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:fast:dexie: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:fast:foundationdb: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=foundationdb NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.// test:fast:loop: runs tests in the fast-mode in a loop. Use this to debug tests that only fail sometimes
scripts.test:fast:loop: npm run test:fast && npm run test:fast:loop
scripts.test:fast:loop:lokijs: npm run test:fast:lokijs && npm run test:fast:loop:lokijs
scripts.test:fast:loop:memory: npm run test:fast:memory && npm run test:fast:loop:memory
scripts.test:fast:loop:dexie: npm run test:fast:dexie && npm run test:fast:loop:dexie
scripts.test:node: npm run test:node:lokijs && npm run test:node:dexie
scripts.test:node:memory: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:memory-validation: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory-validation mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:lokijs: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=lokijs mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:dexie: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:foundationdb: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=foundationdb mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:remote: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=remote mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:lokijs:loop: npm run test:node:lokijs && npm run test:node:lokijs:loop
scripts.test:node:memory:loop: npm run test:node:memory && npm run test:node:memory:loop
scripts.test:node:dexie:loop: npm run test:node:dexie && npm run test:node:dexie:loop
scripts.test:node:foundationdb:loop: npm run test:node:foundationdb && npm run test:node:foundationdb:loop
scripts.test:node:custom: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=custom mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.// test:node:loop: runs tests in node in a loop. Use this to debug tests that only fail sometimes
scripts.test:node:loop: npm run test:node && npm run test:node:loop
scripts.test:browser:loop: npm run test:browser && npm run test:browser:loop
scripts.test:browser:lokijs: npm run transpile && cross-env CI=true DEFAULT_STORAGE=lokijs  karma start ./config/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:browser:memory: npm run transpile && cross-env CI=true DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory  karma start ./config/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:browser:dexie: npm run transpile && cross-env CI=true DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie   karma start ./config/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:browser:remote: npm run transpile && cross-env CI=true DEFAULT_STORAGE=remote karma start ./config/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:browser:custom: npm run transpile && cross-env CI=true DEFAULT_STORAGE=custom  karma start ./config/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:replication-firestore: npm run transpile && firebase emulators:exec "cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/replication-firestore.test.js" --only firestore --project 'rxdb-test'
scripts.test:replication-couchdb: npm run transpile && concurrently "npm run couch:start" "cross-env NATIVE_COUCHDB=5984 DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit/replication-couchdb.test.js" --success first --kill-others
scripts.test:typings: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/typings.test.js
scripts.test:deps: npm run build && dependency-check ./package.json ./dist/lib/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/validate-is-my-json-valid/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/validate-ajv/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/update/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/key-compression/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/dev-mode/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/encryption/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/replication-graphql/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/replication-p2p/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/replication-websocket/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/replication-firestore/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/validate-z-schema/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/storage-lokijs/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/storage-dexie/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/storage-memory/index.js --no-dev --ignore-module util --ignore-module url --ignore-module ws --ignore-module graphql --ignore-module as-typed --ignore-module "@types/*"
scripts.test:performance:lokijs:browser: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=lokijs CI=true karma start ./config/karma.performance.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:performance:lokijs:node: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=lokijs mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:performance:dexie: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie CI=true karma start ./config/karma.performance.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:performance:memory:browser: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory CI=true karma start ./config/karma.performance.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:performance:memory:node: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:performance:foundationdb: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=foundationdb mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:performance:custom:browser: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=custom CI=true karma start ./config/karma.performance.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:performance:custom:node: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=custom mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:performance: npm run build && npm run test:performance:lokijs:browser && npm run test:performance:lokijs:node && npm run test:performance:dexie && npm run test:performance:memory:browser && npm run test:performance:memory:node && npm run test:performance:foundationdb
scripts.profile: npm run transpile && rm -f isolate-* && cross-env STORAGE=memory NODE_ENV=fast NODE_PROF=true mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --v8-prof --expose-gc && node scripts/profile.js
scripts.build:es: rimraf -rf dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=es6 babel src --out-dir dist/es --source-maps --extensions ".ts,.js"
scripts.build: npm run clear && concurrently "npm run transpile" "npm run build:es" "npm run build:types" "npm run build:plugins" && browserify dist/lib/browserify.index.js > dist/rxdb.browserify.js && terser --compress --mangle --output dist/rxdb.browserify.min.js -- dist/rxdb.browserify.js
scripts.build:min: npm run transpile && browserify dist/lib/browserify.index.js > dist/rxdb.browserify.js && terser --compress --mangle --output dist/rxdb.browserify.min.js -- dist/rxdb.browserify.js
scripts.build:webpack: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=build webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js
scripts.// docs: TODO move away from gitbook so we are not forced to use node.js version 13 to build the docs
scripts.// docs:serve: start a local server to watch the docs. Served at http://localhost:4000/
scripts.docs:build: gitbook install docs-src && gitbook build docs-src docs && cp docs-src/files/logo/icon.png docs/gitbook/images/apple-touch-icon-precomposed-152.png && cp docs-src/files/logo/icon.ico docs/gitbook/images/favicon.ico && npm run docs:copy && npm run docs:remove:time
scripts.docs:copy: cp -r docs-src/files docs/files && npm run docs:landingpage:copy
scripts.disc: npm run transpile && npm run build:es && cross-env NODE_ENV=disc webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.dev:example: watch 'npm run transpile:src && echo "done"' src/ test/
